Posts.Content: Thankyou for summing it all up in a perfect parcel. Next week i get my first annual scan results and yep no logic to what's going on in my head. Here's to a return to worry free days Cheers for sharing Xxx
Posts.Title: IS THIS YOU?

Posts.Content: Hello there. I used All clear following a recommendation I found on this site.  They were really reasonable., pretty much the same price as before bc. (I started chemo may 2015, double mast Oct 15, radiotherapy Dec 2015) holiday was summer 2016. best wishes
Posts.Title: Anyone recommend a . good travel insurance comp after chemo's ?

Posts.Content: Hey Catflower When we first find a lump we imagine everything. Any ache can become a pain. I now have secondaries in my spine a few years after my original breast cancer diagnosis,AND I have yet to have a single pain or ache. Long may that continue. The biopsies for me were the worst part of all my treatment and left me with more aches than anything else. Fingers crossed you will be OK and not only the lump will be nothing but so will all those aches. Take care  Xxx
Posts.Title: Secondaries
